title: [Winterchime's Weaponry]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a rainbow colored flag hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gilded maple cabinet and a heavy white granite counter sit in opposite corners while a bronzed drake sculpture rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

Beneath a glass-tiled vaulted ceiling, a trio-bladed mounted vellum fan hangs on one of the painted white plaster walls.  A gilded maple cabinet and a heavy white granite counter sit in opposite corners while a bronzed drake sculpture rests on a gold-speckled marble floor.
